Sentencas: Flow field optimization has an evident effect on the performance improvement of solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOEC).
Titulo: Three-dimensional modeling of flow field optimization for co-electrolysis solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: In this study, a novel flow field based on porous material is proposed to improve the electrolysis efficiency of SOEC.
Titulo: Three-dimensional modeling of flow field optimization for co-electrolysis solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The internal reforming reactions, multi-component diffusion process and co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2 are numerically studied by establishing a three-dimensional model.
Titulo: Three-dimensional modeling of flow field optimization for co-electrolysis solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The results show that the novel design with porous material instead of conventional rib-channel configuration can lower the electrolysis voltage demand up to 0.062 V.
Titulo: Three-dimensional modeling of flow field optimization for co-electrolysis solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: To understand the mechanisms for the improved performance of the new flow field design, the multi-physical field distributions and thermal process are investigated.
Titulo: Three-dimensional modeling of flow field optimization for co-electrolysis solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: It is found that the new flow field design can ensure more uniform distribution of species concentration and reduce the maximum temperature difference by 3.81 K at 1.5 A cm(-2).
Titulo: Three-dimensional modeling of flow field optimization for co-electrolysis solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The thermal analysis indicates that the ohmic loss is the most important factor for temperature distribution.
Titulo: Three-dimensional modeling of flow field optimization for co-electrolysis solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: In addition, the structure and configuration of porous flow field are further optimized to obtain a better performance.
Titulo: Three-dimensional modeling of flow field optimization for co-electrolysis solid oxide electrolysis cell
